title: [1.7.2&1.7.10][ssp/smp]Somnia-真实睡眠
author: 风韵
txt_content:
本帖最后由 风韵 于 2015-6-28 21:26 编辑 

Somnia - Simulating the world while you sleep!
这次搬运-真实睡眠MOD能够使玩家睡眠更加真实。在玩家睡觉时使MC的时间加速，同时让农作物生长，物品烧练，机械运作等持续下去。




2013-08-18_22.13.55.png (127.69 KB, 下载次数: 620)

下载附件

2014-7-20 21:40 上传





左上角的“X54”是MC的运行速度(貌似与TPS有关)，右边的钟是用来看时间的。运行速度和睡眠时间成正比，速度越快则算入睡眠时间越长。加载MOD多，速度慢，算入睡眠时间短。注:睡眠需要冷却一段时间后才能接着睡!
作者的介绍(英文未翻译)
The multiplier value on the left (in orange) is the speed Minecraft is running at. The default value without this mod is of course "x1" which is 20 ticks per second. You can calculate your theoretical TPS (ticks per second) value with, your multiplier * 20. This value will vary depending on how active your world is, how many mods and such you have and your CPU, Somnia does balance the multiplier to help prevent FPS drop in single player. The time value on the right (in white) is the current dimension time (prior to prerelease 1c, this always showed the overworld time since 1c introduced dimensional sleeping).
下载

原帖&网盘

关于部分配置
主要说明重要部分
“D:baseMultiplier”--基础倍数，默认是1.0
“D:multiplierCap”--倍频上限，默认是100.0
“B:sleepWithArmor”--穿戴护甲睡觉，默认不予许(关闭时穿戴护甲睡觉会提示:That armor looks uncomfrotable!)
“ I:sleepCooldown”--睡眠冷却时间，默认是12000(也就是说你睡觉完之后需要冷却才能接着睡)

更新日志(别指望我翻译了==)

1.4.1.23
Fixed config issue preventing mob spawningAdded ru_RU.langAdded fatigue system (configurable)Added fatigue side effects (confusion, slowness, etc) (also configurable)Cooldown feature has been replaced by a minimum fatigue value (also configurable)Resigned GUI (as always, not finished but improved)
Added progress bar using repeated experience barsAdded ETALower text scaling for sharper looking textRemoved time text (seemed a little overkill)
1.3.1.16
Fixed a lot of crashes including the constant multiplayer crash when sleepingPlayer will no longer teleport back to the bed when the auto wake timer expires.Fixed assets not being copied causing unhelpful information such as 'somnia.status.cooldown'Reimplemented light check performance patch to work with 1.7.10
1.3.0.15
Updated to 1.7.10Added sleep overriding to allow ops to remain awake and 'watch the world go by' - /somnia override add
1.2.0.14
Implemented sleep cooldown (see configuration file)Rewrote server ticking logic and state detectionStatus message localizationPackage cachingForced wake (anti-hack)Fixed warning message about versionCentered status text on GUI
以后的更新会不稳定，建议大家去官网。
楼主电脑配置渣，MC1.7.2版本之后就不能正常运行了。所以不知道MOD有没有什么问题...
